oai_dc:dc.dc:title: W.T. Grant Department Store on Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 1968 November
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A nighttime scene picturing the W.T. Grant Department Store and cars driving along Church Street in downtown Nashville. Forms part of the Alfred Lane Futrell Collection. 1 photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: William T. Grants Department Store (Nashville, Tenn.)
